name: Skip with a Twist
steps: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Start skipping by lifting your right knee up towards your chest and hopping on your left foot.
As you land on your left foot, twist your torso to the right and bring your right elbow across your body to tap your left knee.
Repeat on the other side by hopping on your right foot and twisting your torso to the left to tap your right knee with your left elbow.
Continue to alternate sides, hopping on one foot and twisting your torso to tap the opposite knee.
comments: Start with a slower pace and gradually increase speed as you become more comfortable with the movement.
Keep your core engaged throughout the exercise to maintain balance.
Land lightly on the foot that is on the ground to reduce impact and prevent injury.
Keep your arms relaxed and swing them naturally with the movement.
Keep your gaze forward and avoid looking down at your feet.
Breathe deeply and rhythmically throughout the exercise.
If you have any knee or hip issues, be sure to modify the exercise or consult a doctor before attempting.
